name.ja: さわらび明朝とさわらびゴシック

description.en: The approach by MShio (a pseudonym) for Sawarabi Mincho and Sawarabi Gothic is comprehensive, as this type family is designed from scratch and for all four scripts: Kanji, Hiragana, Katakana, and Latin. For a freely available Japanese typeface, this is rather a rare case. The font design is delicate and beautiful, and is also suitable for small size typesetting. MShio continues to extend the Kanji character set.

quote.ja: 本文用のフォントとして使いやすくなるようにイメージしています。
quote.en: Designed and optimised as text type.

description.en: The approach by MShio (a pseudonym) for Sawarabi Mincho and Sawarabi Gothic is comprehensive, as this type family is designed from scratch and for all four scripts: Kanji, Hiragana, Katakana, and Latin. For a freely available Japanese typeface, this is rather a rare case. The font design is delicate and beautiful, and is also suitable for small size typesetting. MShio continues to extend the Kanji character set.

quote.ja: 本文用のフォントとして使いやすくなるようにイメージしています。
quote.en: Designed and optimised as text type.

description.en: Hannari, featured here, and Kokoro are two Mincho Kana-fonts by Nakai Yoshihisa. The design of Hannari is inspired by the historical design of Tsukiji. Hannari show traces of the writing hand—dynamic with big counters and a gentle touch. The Kana of Kokoro are condensed and upright and keep the subtle touch of a casual handwriting. Incorporated with the Kanji of another Mincho font, Hannari and Kokoro give a text a unique atmosphere.

quote.ja: 明朝体は墨溜まりを意識してデザインしています。
quote.en: This Mincho style keeps and includes the visual impression of ink spots.

description.en: Kokoro, featured here, and Hannari are two Mincho Kana-fonts by Nakai Yoshihisa. The design of Hannari is inspired by the historical design of Tsukiji. Hannari show traces of the writing hand—dynamic with big counters and a gentle touch. The Kana of Kokoro are condensed and upright and keep the subtle touch of a casual handwriting. Incorporated with the Kanji of another Mincho font, Hannari and Kokoro give a text a unique atmosphere.

quote.ja: 少しほっそりとした、角丸な明朝体です。まろやかで、軽い感じがする文字です。
quote.en: A slim Mincho face with rounded endings. The characters look smooth and light.

quote.ja: 日常的に使うための飽きのこない、それでいてちょっと気になるデザイン。

description.en: For Nicomoji, Kudo took reference from the logo type of the Japanese video hosting service, niconico doga. The designer created the remaining Hiragana and Katakana (not included in the logo type) in this flat and extended expressive type design.

quote.ja: すこしでもデザインのてだすけになれればさいわいです。
quote.en: I hope to do a cotribution to designers with this typeface.

nikukyu.description: To focus on Kana or even only on Katakana, is a popular method often applied for the design of display fonts. This is the case for Nikukyu, a playful design by Yoshihisa Sakai. The chubby shapes refer to the soft paws of cats. Each character is equipped with a highlight spot.

quote.ja: モリっとして、ツヤのあるカタカナフォントです。

description.en: The approach by MShio (a pseudonym) for Sawarabi Mincho and Sawarabi Gothic is comprehensive, as this type family is designed from scratch and for all four scripts: Kanji, Hiragana, Katakana, and Latin. For a freely available Japanese typeface, this is rather a rare case. The font design is delicate and beautiful, and is also suitable for small size typesetting. MShio continues to extend the Kanji character set.

quote.ja: 本文用のフォントとして使いやすくなるようにイメージしています。
quote.en: Designed and optimised as text type.
Noto fonts are intended to be visually harmonious across multiple languages, with compatible heights and stroke thicknesses.

quote.ja: 誰でも、気軽に使ってほしいです。
quote.en: I hope people will enjoy using this typeface.

roundedmplus.description: Rounded Mgen+ by MM from Jikasei Font Kobo extends the M+ family withby a rounded version, for all weights and styles.

quote.ja: 明るく伸びやかなデザインを心がけた。
quote.en: I intended a design that is openminded and relaxed.
